comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Edgar Bramwell Piper (b. 1865), editor of The Oregonian. He wrote a book, Somewhere Near the War, about his experiences covering WWI.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: readable online at archive.org/details/somewherenearwar00pipe He died May 3, 1928, having been editor of the Portland Oregonian for 18 years. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F30713F83E5C177A...

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and artolog: thanks for the full name and the additional background information.  We will update our record.
